channel.title: Minimal Kicksecure Qubes Template
channel.description: Please work with minimal templates in mind from the get go. `sys-` templates with a plethora of desktop apps installed are not great.

item.title: Minimal Kicksecure Qubes Template
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I don’t plan working on this.

This is the Kicksecure forum but a similar request was made against Whonix for minimal Whonix templates. My longer answers there would be applicable here for Kicksecure too:

  • Whonix minimal template? - Qubes-Whonix - Whonix Forum
  • Minimal Whonix templates · Issue #8874 · QubesOS/qubes-issues · GitHub

Read full topic
